snippet.title: Carderia Trailer
snippet.description:
​Rebuild and defend the fallen medieval town of Carderia where all is represented through cards. Stack your cards together and end your turn, to create buildings, mine ore, grow food and more!  

But be careful to not run out of food throughout the nasty cold winters, live, survive and you may prosper during the verdant summers. Carderia is full of predictable and unpredictable events alike that spices up the gameplay in every run. 

Explore and combine 50+ Interactable cards. 

Experience 20+ Unique events. 

Enjoy 10 Progressive soundtracks. 

We hope to see how you will rebuild Carderia! 
https://kaimune.itch.io/carderia
